metadata.title: CVE-2023-52837 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: nbd:fix uaf in nbd_open Commit 4af5f2e03013 ("nbd: use blk_mq_alloc_disk andblk_cleanup_disk") cleans up disk by blk_cleanup_disk() and it won't setdisk->private_data as NULL as before. UAF may be triggered in nbd_open() ifsomeone tries to open nbd device right after nbd_put() since nbd has beenfree in nbd_dev_remove(). Fix this by implementing ->free_disk and freeprivate data in it.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
